title: Time Series Channel Metadata
description: Metadata describing time series sample data recorded on a single channel

id.description: Pennsieve platform identifier for the time series channel

start.description: epoch-based timestamp in microseconds when the channel recording began

end.description: epoch-based timestamp in microseconds when the channel recording ended

unit.description: unit the sample data is captured in e.g. uV

rate.description: rate (in hertz) at which sampling occurs e.g. 200 Hz

index.description: index of the start of the contiguous chunk of sample data

start.description: index-aligned epoch-based timestamp in microseconds when the contiguous chunk begins

items.description: any additional properties associated with the time series channel
